div.head: Canon 23
div.p:
Quia ignorantia tenebrae sint, scientia uero lux
in domino, et utraque filios suos habent.

Hebr. (8.) 9.
can. XXI: I. Cor. 2, 1. 15. (cf. Rom. 8, 5.) Eph. 4, 13.
can. XXII: Rom. 5,12.21; 6, 16. 23. (cf. I. Cor. 9, 27; II. Cor. 11,20.)
can. XXIII: Eph. 4,18; 5, 8.
